short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forge Chrome extension to review code with Codeium's AI tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forge Chrome extension to review code with AI.

Infuse AI into your pull request review flow. Forge needs access to your repository pull requests in order to provide AI-powered review features.
